thread.title: The Carl M. Freeman Companies Announces Smart Phone App For Bayside
thread.title_full: The Carl M. Freeman Companies Announces Smart Phone App For Bayside - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: The Carl M. Freeman Companies Announces Smart Phone App For Bayside
text:
Delaware's first new home's community App produced to keep in touch with residents, members and guests.
Selbyville, Delaware (PRWEB) October 01, 2015
The Carl M. Freeman Companies is thrilled to announce the launch of the LiveBayside App, Delaware’s first and only neighborhood and new homes community App. This free App was produced so homeowners, members and guests can conveniently access all there is to know about Delaware’s Community of the Year for 2015. The free LiveBayside App is available at the Apple App store and Google Play. Search keywords “Livebayside”.
“Whether you’re looking for a phone number, registering for a Bayside Institute class or receiving real time notification for an event or venue change, this is the perfect way to stay in touch with our community”, said Michelle D. Freeman, President and CEO of Carl M. Freeman Companies. “There’s a map that gives users information on locations within our community as well as all the best restaurants, shopping and attractions surrounding Bayside. The App allows our homeowners and those living around Bayside the means to stay connected and know what’s going on! We even have an instructional video on how to use our App on the livebayside.com website”, Freeman went on to say.
The Carl M. Freeman Companies have been involved in the Southern Delaware community for more than 45 years. Beginning in 1969 with the groundbreaking of Sea Colony, through the development of The Preserve, Village of Bear Trap Dunes and the Bayside Community, along with great shopping centers, such as Bayside Marketplace, conveniently located on Route 54 outside of the Bayside Community. The company continues to be active within the Delaware beaches through real estate development and management services and operations of their three golf courses.
About The Carl M. Freeman Companies
For more than 68 years the Carl M. Freeman Companies has created places that enrich lives through their innovative and inviting places to live, work, shop and play. The company has developed and managed more than five million square feet of commercial space for shopping center and office use, servicing more than 1.1 million square feet of retail; built award-winning beach-front and golf course communities; and developed more than 20,000 homes in 50 residential communities across Delaware, Maryland and West Virginia. The Carl M. Freeman Companies is headquartered in Rockville, MD with a regional office in Selbyville, DE.
For more information about Carl M. Freeman Companies and their diverse interests, visit http://www.freemancompanies.com or call (240) 453-3000.
To learn more about Bayside, visit http://www.livebayside.com
